Việt Note: một số lượng lớn (cái gì); nhiều

Việt Note: ngày sinh, sự ra đời, sự sinh đẻ

Note: an area of sand or small stones (called shingle), next to the sea or a lake

Note: to strike or hit repeatedly, or to defeat someone in a competition or a game

Việt Note: để bảo vệ, để phòng thủ
Note: protecting somebody/something against attack

Việt Note: trình độ, học vị, bằng cấp

Việt Note: sự phân phát (thư) , sự giao (hàng); hàng được giao, thư được phát, đợt giao hàng, đợt phân phát thư

Việt Note: (chính trị) cuộc biểu tình, cuộc biểu tình tuần hành, cuộc biểu dương lực lượng

Việt Note: cục, vụ, ty, ban, khoa, bộ

Note: behaving in a kind and pleasant way because you like somebody or want to help them
Example: I met some friendly people at the park yesterday.

Việt Note: tình bạn, tình bằng hữu, tình hữu nghị
Note: a relationship between friends
Example: They formed a close friendship at college.

Việt Note: sự nản lòng, sự thất vọng
Note: the feeling of being frustrated
Example: Dave thumped the table in frustration.

Note: any material that produces heat or power, usually when it is burnt

Note: a special activity or purpose of a person or thing
Example: The club serves a useful function as a meeting place.

Note: an amount of money that has been saved or has been made available for a particular purpose
Example: He invested a large sum of money in a mutual fund.

Note: serious and very important; affecting the most central and important parts of something

Note: money for a particular purpose; the act of providing money for such a purpose

Note: a ceremony, often a religious one, for burying or cremating (= burning) a dead person

Note: objects that can be moved, such as tables, chairs and beds, that are put into a house or an office to make it suitable for living or working in
Example: I need to buy some new furniture for my living room.

Note: in addition to what has just been stated. Furthermore is used especially to add a point to an argument.

Note: the time that will come after the present or the events that will happen then
Example: We need to plan for the future.

Việt Note: thu được, lấy được, giành được, kiếm được, đạt được

Note: any of the large systems of stars, etc. in outer space
Example: The Milky Way is the galaxy where our solar system is located.

Note: a room or building for showing works of art, especially to the public
Example: We spent the afternoon browsing the art gallery downtown.

Note: an organized group of criminals
Example: The robbery was carried out by an armed gang.

Note: a space between two things or in the middle of something, especially because there is a part missing

Việt Note: ga ra, nhà để xe ô tô

Note: a piece of land next to or around your house where you can grow flowers, fruit, vegetables, etc., usually with a lawn (= an area of grass)

Note: a vegetable of the onion family with a very strong taste and smell, used in cooking to add taste to food

Note: a barrier like a door that is used to close an opening in a fence or a wall outside a building

Việt Note: tụ họp, tập hợp, tụ tập
Note: to come together, or bring people together, in one place to form a group

Note: to look steadily at somebody/something for a long time, either because you are very interested or surprised, or because you are thinking of something else

Việt Note: thiết bị; bánh răng; sự truyền động bánh răng; số (ô tô...)
Note: equipment in a vehicle that changes the relation between engine speed (or pedal speed on a bicycle) and the speed of the wheels moving forwards or backwards

Note: the fact of being male or female, especially when considered with reference to social and cultural differences, not differences in biology; members of a particular gender as a group

Note: a unit inside a cell that controls a particular quality in a living thing that has been passed on from its parents

Note: refers to something that is not specific or particular, but rather relates to a broad or overall category or concept

Việt Note: bởi hầu hết mọi người; nói chung; thường thường
Note: by or to most people

Note: connected with genes (= the units in the cells of a living thing that control its physical characteristics) or genetics (= the study of genes)

Việt Note: người thanh lịch, người hào hoa phong nhã, quý ông

Việt Note: nhẹ nhàng, êm ái, dịu dàng

Việt Note: điệu bộ; cử chỉ; sự ra hiệu (bằng tay, bằng đầu)

Việt Note: quà tặng, quà biếu, tặng phẩm

Việt Note: có năng khiếu, có tài, tài ba

Note: a girl or a woman that somebody is having a romantic relationship with

Note: pleased; happy

Việt Note: liếc nhìn, liếc nhanh, nhìn qua

Việt Note: kính; thủy tinh; cái ly, cốc thủy tinh

Note: a piece of clothing for the hand, made of wool, leather, etc. with separate parts for each finger and the thumb

Note: a frame with a net into which players must kick or hit the ball in order to score a point

Note: made of gold
Example: A golden key opens every door.

Note: a game played over a large area of ground using sticks with a special shape to hit a small hard ball (a golf ball) into a series of 9 or 18 holes, using as few shots as possible

Việt Note: chính phủ, nội các; chính quyền

Việt Note: thống sứ (ở thuộc địa); thống đốc (tiểu bang)

Note: to take or hold somebody/something with your hand suddenly or roughly

Việt Note: điểm (của học sinh); hạng xếp loại
Note: a mark given in an exam or for a piece of school work

Việt Note: (một cách) tuần tự, dần dần, từ từ

Note: to complete school, college, or university successfully

Note: impressive and large or important

Việt Note: chấp nhận, cho phép, đồng ý

Việt Note: lớn nhất, có ý nghĩa nhất

Note: the solid surface of the earth

Việt Note: sự bảo hành, sự bảo đảm

Việt Note: đường cái, quốc lộ, đường cao tốc

Việt Note: không thể tin được, đáng kinh ngạc

Việt Note: sự kiên quyết, quyết tâm, nghị quyết, quyết định

Note: to solve or end a problem or difficulty

Việt Note: nơi nghỉ dưỡng, khu nghỉ mát
Note: a place where a lot of people go on holiday

Note: a supply of something that a country, an organization or a person has and can use, especially to increase their wealth
Example: The new project requires a lot of resources to be completed on time.

Việt Note: sự tôn trọng, sự kính trọng
Note: a strong feeling of approval of somebody/something because of their good qualities or achievements

Note: to give a spoken or written answer to somebody/something

Việt Note: người được hỏi, người được phỏng vấn, đối tượng điều tra
Note: a person who answers questions, especially in a survey

Việt Note: sự trả lời; lời trả lời; câu trả lời
Note: a spoken or written answer

Note: a duty to deal with or take care of somebody/something, so that you may be blamed if something goes wrong

Note: having the job or duty of doing something or taking care of somebody/something, so that you may be blamed if something goes wrong

Note: a period of relaxing, sleeping or doing nothing after a period of activity

Việt Note: trả lại, hoàn lại; khôi phục lại

Note: to keep something; to continue to have something

Việt Note: sự (cho) nghỉ hưu, sự (cho) hưu trí

Note: to come or go back from one place to another

Việt Note: bộc lộ, biểu lộ; tiết lộ, để lộ ra (điều bí mật), công khai

Việt Note: sự xem lại, sự xem xét lại, sự kiểm lại, sự ôn tập

Note: a strong regular repeated pattern of sounds or movements

Việt Note: giàu, giàu có, có nhiều tiền, có của cải

Note: a garden plant with thorns on its stems and pleasant-smelling flowers, or a flower from this plant

Việt Note: ráp, nhám, xù xì, gồ ghề, bờm xờm, lởm chởm
Note: having a surface that is not even or regular

Note: having a shape like a circle or a ball

Note: a way that you follow to get from one place to another

Việt Note: sự bán, việc bán, kinh doanh

Việt Note: (the same) cùng một, cũng như thế, giống nhau, như nhau

Việt Note: sự vừa ý, sự thỏa mãn, sự hài lòng

Việt Note: theo hướng, về phía, hướng về

Note: an object for children to play with

Việt Note: theo vết, lần theo dấu vết

Việt Note: thương mại, mậu dịch, sự buôn bán

Việt Note: sự đi lại, sự giao thông

Note: to move from one place to another; to move something/somebody from one place to another

Việt Note: sự biến đổi, sự thay đổi

Việt Note: sự chuyển tiếp, sự quá độ

Việt Note: sự chuyên chở, sự vận tải; giao thông vận tải
Note: a system for carrying people or goods from one place to another using vehicles, roads, etc.

Việt Note: đi xa, du hành, đi du lịch
Note: to go from one place to another, especially over a long distance

Việt Note: điều lo lắng, điều phiền toái, điều rắc rối

Việt Note: sự tin tưởng, sự tin cậy, sự tín nhiệm

Note: to know or realize the meaning of words, a language, what somebody says, etc.

Note: the knowledge that somebody has about a particular subject or situation

Việt Note: không may là, đáng tiếc là

Việt Note: chung, phổ cập, phổ biến; phổ thông

Note: staying with or supporting a particular person, organization or belief
Example: He was a faithful companion who never left my side.

Việt Note: bợ đỡ, nịnh hót, xu nịnh
Note: praising someone too much and giving them a lot of attention that is not sincere in order to get a positive reaction
Example: The politician's fawning behavior towards the wealthy donors was obvious to everyone.

Note: good at learning, understanding and thinking in a logical way about things; showing this ability
Example: My son is very intelligent.

Việt Note: ghen, ghen tuông, ghen tị, ghen tức
Note: feeling angry or unhappy because somebody you like or love is showing interest in somebody else
Example: She became jealous when she saw her ex-boyfriend with another girl.

Việt Note: ép, nén; bị ép, bị nén
Note: to press something so that it becomes soft, damaged or flat, or changes shape
Example: The tomatoes at the bottom of the bag had been squashed.

Note: a long vegetable with dark green skin that is light green inside, usually eaten raw
Example: Slice the cucumber thinly.

Note: a small red and white root vegetable with a strong taste, eaten raw in salads
Example: I like to eat radish with my salad.

Việt Note: sự giữ, sự giữ gìn; sự bảo tồn
Note: the act of keeping something in its original state or in good condition
Example: Preservation of historical landmarks is crucial for maintaining cultural heritage.

Note: used water and waste substances that are produced by human bodies, that are carried away from houses and factories through special pipes (= sewers)
Example: Sewage was the major cause of water pollution.

Note: meat from a young sheep
Example: The lamb was cooked to perfection.

Note: having a strong, unpleasant taste; not sweet
Example: Black coffee leaves a bitter taste in the mouth.

Note: to cook food by putting it in water that is boiling
Example: I need to boil the potatoes for dinner tonight.

Note: having a very pleasant taste or smell
Example: Who cooked this? It's absolutely delicious.

Note: the scientific study of the life and structure of plants and animals
Example: Biology is the study of living organisms and their interactions with each other and their environment.

Note: the scientific study of the sun, moon, stars, planets, etc.
Example: Astronomy is the study of stars, planets, and other celestial objects.

Note: the scientific study of language or of particular languages
Example: Linguistics is the scientific study of language and its structure.

Note: the amount of something that a person, a machine or an organization produces
Example: Manufacturing output has increased by 8 per cent.

Note: the scientific study of the structure of substances, how they react when combined or in contact with one another, and how they behave under different conditions
Example: He did physics and chemistry at university.

Note: the study of cultures of the past, and of periods of history by examining the parts of buildings and objects found in the ground
Example: Archaeology is the study of human history through the excavation and analysis of artifacts.

Note: the fact of operating or being active
Example: There are several reactors of the type in operation at the moment.

Note: a vegetable with long light-green stems that are often eaten raw
Example: Celery juice is good for health.

Note: a person that you know but who is not a close friend
Example: Claire has a wide circle of friends and acquaintances.

Note: a person who attends or attended the same school as you
Example: Linda is my schoolmate.

Note: an area where people live that is outside the centre of a city
Example: They moved to the quiet suburb to escape the hustle and bustle of city life.

Việt Note: hàng (người, xe…) xếp nối đuôi nhau chờ
Note: a line of people, cars, etc. waiting for something or to do something
Example: There were long queues at polling stations.
